metadata.title: CVE-2022-49016 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: mdiobus: fix unbalanced node reference countI got the following report while doing device(mscc-miim) load testwith CONFIG_OF_UNITTEST and CONFIG_OF_DYNAMIC enabled:  OF: ERROR: memory leak, expected refcount 1 instead of 2,  of_node_get()/of_node_put() unbalanced - destroy cset entry:  attach overlay node /spi/soc@0/mdio@7107009c/ethernet-phy@0If the 'fwnode' is not an acpi node, the refcount is get infwnode_mdiobus_phy_device_register(), but it has never beenput when the device is freed in the normal path. So callfwnode_handle_put() in phy_device_release() to avoid leak.If it's an acpi node, it has never been get, but it's putin the error path, so call fwnode_handle_get() beforephy_device_register() to keep get/put operation balanced.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-49016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required
